extracted-table.table-caption: Demographic characteristics in primary angle-closure glaucoma (PACG) subjects and healthy control (HC).

caption.p: Demographic characteristics in primary angle-closure glaucoma (PACG) subjects and healthy control (HC).

fn.p: IOP, intraocular pressure; VA, visual acuity; MDVF, mean deviation of visual field; HCDR, horizontal cup-to-disc ratio; VCDR, vertical cup-to-disc ratio; RNFL, retina nerve fiber layer; N/A, not applicable. <CPS

extracted-table.table-caption: Differences in voxel-mirrored homotopic connectivity (VMHC) between two group.

caption.p: Differences in voxel-mirrored homotopic connectivity (VMHC) between two group.

fn.p: VMHC, voxel mirrored homotopic connectivity; BA, Brodmann’s area; (x, y, z), coordinate of peak in the MNI space; T value, statistical value of peak voxel. AlphaSim corrected, p < 0.005, cluster size > 26.

extracted-table.table-caption: Group differences in functional connectivity of regions of interest (ROIs) between primary angle-closure glaucoma (PACG) and healthy control (HC).

caption.p: Group differences in functional connectivity of regions of interest (ROIs) between primary angle-closure glaucoma (PACG) and healthy control (HC).

fn.p: ROIs, regions of interest; BA, Brodmann’s area; (x, y, z), coordinate of peak in the MNI space; T value, statistical value of peak voxel; R, right; L, left. AlphaSim corrected, p < 0.005, cluster size > 26.
